summary: This is an internal FBI email regarding a scheduling error for the CID UC Weekly Meeting with the Assistant Director. It instructs recipients to delete cancelled meeting invites and notes that a new invite will be sent. The document appears to be routine administrative communication within the FBI's Criminal Investigative Division.

persons.name: Executive Assistant to the Assistant Director
persons.context: Sends email regarding cancellation and rescheduling of the CID UC Weekly Meeting due to an error.

events.title: CID UC Weekly Meeting scheduling error
events.description: An error caused the entire CID UC Weekly Meeting invite series to be cancelled unintentionally. Recipients are instructed to delete cancelled invites, and a new invite is promised.
personsInvolved: Executive Assistant to the Assistant Director

keyFacts: The email is dated February 14, 2018, and concerns the FBI's Criminal Investigative Division (CID).
It references a 'CID UC Weekly Meeting w/AD' (likely with the Assistant Director).
The communication is routine administrative correspondence about meeting scheduling, with no direct mention of Epstein case matters.
